Package marytts.unitselection.select

Interface Summary
JoinCostFunction A join cost function for evaluating the goodness-of-fit of a given pair of left and right unit.
StatisticalCostFunction A statistical cost function
TargetCostFunction A target cost function for evaluating the goodness-of-fit of a given unit for a given target.

SelectedUnit A unit selected from Viterbi
StatisticalModelCost StatisticalModelCost for a given unit
Target A representation of a target representing the ideal properties of a unit in a target utterance.
UnitSelector Selects the units for an utterance
VocalizationFFRTargetCostFunction FFRTargetCostFunction for vocalization selection
